Body:
kernel = kernel_class(**{param_name: param_value})
assert kernel.ard is ard
pytest.mark.parametrize('kernel_class, param_name', [[gpflow.kernels.
    SquaredExponential, 'lengthscales'], [gpflow.kernels.Linear, 'variance'
    ], [gpflow.kernels.ArcCosine, 'weight_variances']])pytest.mark.parametrize('param_value, ard', [[1.0, False], [[1.0], True], [
    [1.0, 1.0], True]])
